reviews.text: very nice, rooms are new and modern, clean and offer free internet, free movies, microwave and kettle. Bathroom in huge with shower and bathtub. The staff is very friendly, although sometimes you have to wait because it is shared with the hotel next door. is located in a quiet area with good parking facilities. It 's still possible to park in a nearby hotel parking. The center is near as restaurant.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: This is a new concept. And I liked it!
reviews.title: A new hotel concept

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is quite big and well equiped and everything is optimised for a low cost but high comfort. Nothing to blame about. This type of hotel runs with very few personnel but it doesn't seems to affect the quality of service.
reviews.title: Great spot, tasteful room, good value

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is conveniently located and about five to ten minutes' walk from dozens of restaurants and bars. The staff were always courteous and professional. The suite itself was really tasteful - minimalist and modern. Floor to ceiling white curtains divide the sleeping area from the living room. Bed was super comfortable and firm. The adjacent building work that previous reviewers commented on has been completed.
reviews.title: Go Novotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Novotel Suites beat all our expectations. The rooms are bright, spacious and nicely decorated in white tones. A kitchenette is cleverly hidden behind sliding doors. The movie on remake is just great (and free of charge) Bathroom is spacious with separate rainshower and bathtub. The Novotel Suites are a 10 min walk from the city centre.
reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful Euro chic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't have a reservation on arriving in Perpignan, and this was the first hotel we checked. The receptionist told us there was no parking available on the hotel, so we decided to try a different hotel. After cruising a few more hotels, we decided to return to this hotel and park on the street. However, when asked where the best place to park is, we were told that next door parking lot has an arrangement for a reduced price with the hotel.
reviews.title: The best room on our trip

reviews.text: Room was amazing!!! Very clean and modernly design, with small treats like coffee and cookies.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: Stuff was very helpful in giving directions to a nearby restaurant which was open by the time we settled (21:30)
reviews.title: Fab rooms- building site next door.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is five minutes walk from the city center.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The rooms are large and nice, as expected from Novotel brand.
reviews.title: Very comfortable!

reviews.text: We spent a night in Perpignan before flying back to the UK after a holiday.
reviews.title: Great value in Perpignan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Suite Novotel was a great choice. The hotel is 5 or so minutes walk from the old quarter and a 10 minute taxi ride from the airport.
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: The rooms, clean and spacious and decked out in a contemporary - brilliant value for the price you pay and a cut above the normal chain hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A mixup at check in - the receptionist couldn't find our booking and was convinced I had made a mistake and was booked into the etap next door - is the only grumble I have.
reviews.title: Modern spacious and well equipped - very impressive!

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The suite is perfect for a couple for a 2-3 night stay. The bathroom and shower were great and very fonctional.
reviews.title: Very nice and modern hotel, extremely good service

reviews.text: This was our second night exploring Aude! The hotel was easy to find with our sat nav. Parking was terrible I paid on street at first moved inside - under hotel after and 24 hours cost 17 euros eek! we had a deal on our room though so not too bad all-in-all.
reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for more - xcept parking

reviews.text: Our room was fab! All new lovely decor, big bath huge shower! kitchenette with kettle, sink, microwave etc. no view! They had given us free films which was great with the kids we watched 9, How to Train Your Dragon, Coraline and Shutter island from 6pm as we bought food to eat in and it was raining - would have cost us 10 euros each film normally.
reviews.title: Pretty good ... wil be nice when it's finished!

reviews.text: We thought this hotel was a bargain and there is a great shop across the road for groceries, the building work did wake me up early but the rest of the family slept through it.
reviews.title: Brand new hotel.
